pages.title: Deep Crystal Ore
pages.text: This ore can be found in every dimension. It drops $(l:e_item_deep_crystal_powder)Deep Crystal Powder/el when mined or the ore itself when mined with silk touch. In a $(l:e_block_mana_grinder)Mana Grinder/el it can be broken down into Deep Crystal Powder and in a furnace it gets smelted into $(l:e_item_deep_crystal)Deep Crystals/el.

The spawn heights for this ore are as follows:/liOverworld: 1-12/liNether: 1-200/liEnd: 1-100/li$(l:e_dimension_insanity_dimension)Insanity Dimension/el: 1-64/li$(l:e_dimension_depth_dimension)Depth Dimension/el: 1-200/liDeep Dark: 1-64/liTwilight Forest: 1-12/liAroma Mining World: 1-64/liOther: 1-12/br2The following pages display all ore variants for different dimensions
This variant of the ore can be found in the Overworld and all dimensions that are added by mods.

pages.title: Nether Version
pages.text: This variant of the ore can only be found in the Nether dimension.

pages.title: End Version
pages.text: This variant of the ore can only be found in the End dimension.

pages.title: Insanity Version
pages.text: This variant of the ore can only be found in the Insanity dimension.

pages.title: Compressed Version
pages.text: This variant of the ore can only be found in the Depth dimension.
